radiographic_examinations.findings: All 6 patients were negative on screening with [123I]MIBG.
3 of 4 patients showed positive uptake; revealed increased uptake in the left orbit, lungs, and left hilar region for patient 1.
CT scanning of the abdomen confirmed multiple hepatic deposits for patient 2.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent follow-up revealed abdominal lymph node and skeletal involvement for patient 2.

radiographic_examinations.findings: MRI revealed a left orbital mass for patient 1; confirmed bilateral choroidal lesions for patient 6.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeated subsequent clinical examination after treatment revealed inactive choroidal lesions for patient 3.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Positive uptake in the right orbit, liver, abdomen, and throughout the skeleton for patient 5.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Treatment led to regression of the choroidal metastasis and clinical improvement lasting 3 years.
